thread.title: 8 Alabama Instagram accounts fashion fans should follow
thread.title_full: 8 Alabama Instagram accounts fashion fans should follow

author: Sara Frye | sfrye@al.com
title: 8 Alabama Instagram accounts fashion fans should follow
text:
Based in: Mobile, AL 
Day job: Owner of Hartzog Consulting a branding, public relations and project management firm 
Describe your account to new followers: "It's a good hub, a mix between things creative and business. I have a mixed professional background, so it wouldn't be fair if I wasn't highlighting fashion, yet chronicling some of my travels and things that are going on in the business world. Some days I'm raving about a new found lipstick that I can't live without.... other posts are about events, social causes and projects that are going on, both in Mobile and nationally." 
Advice for people who want to have a successful Instagram: "If you analyze some of the Instagram greats, those with a following and engagement that makes others envious, you realize that they are relevant. They provide information that is appealing to their followers. They're at the forefront of trends, and their content consistently provides visual satisfaction concerning things people want to be informed about. Being a relevant source is vital to social media success." 
When we asked our readers about the best Instagram accounts in Alabama, we expected to get a handful of suggestions. Instead we received hundreds! We reached out to the best of the best and asked them about their accounts, and over the next two weeks, we'll highlight these accounts in a series of stories. 
You can see all of the accounts suggested by our readers here: A photo posted by AL.com (@aldotcompix) on Aug 19, 2015 at 2:14pm PDT
